name: Trianguloid
description:
Subtly triangle-themed Asteroids Clone, for Trijam #111

For Trijam #111. Theme: Triangles... made in less than three hours

Our use of the theme is, ehem, 'subtle and understated': The sprites are made up of triangles, the music is made with triangle waves, the sounds of the explosions and the firing of weapons are names of triangles, and there is a chant of triangle varieties running in the background with a triangle-wave drone under the chant. The font is also composed of triangles, but we didn't make that (cited below the software listing).

Use arrow keys, or A and D, to move. Space or left-mouse click to shoot.

Team: Rainsong (coding, music, and art) and Enjaku (voice and art)

Software used:
ct.js
Photoshop
Affinity Designer
Beepbox
Reaper

Also used the triangle-based Merkur font

Font https://www.fontspace.com/merkur-font-f11606
by Malwin Béla Hürkey (2011)
